messages.title: We want to hear from you!
messages.content: SNP Government is delivering for Scotland: we've frozen Council Tax, put more police on the street, prevented prescription charges, campaigned to save schools from closure, and invested in Glasgow's future to make it fairer, healthier, greener, and more confident.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Preventing prescription charges, saving schools from closure, and investing in Glasgow's future.

mentions.candidate: Patrick Grady is standing for the SNP in Glasgow North.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Local people are voting SNP in greater numbers, with a chart showing a percentage increase and stating 'Vote SNP To Win In Glasgow North'.

issues.economy: Frozen Council Tax, put more police on the street.
issues.education: Campaign to save schools from closure.
issues.environment: Investment in Glasgow's future to make it fairer, healthier, greener.

contactInformation.address: Suite 334, 3rd Floor Baltic Chambers, 50 Wellington Street, G2 6HJ
